definitions: a knob or lever that is moved horizontally or vertically to control a variable, such as the volume of a radio.
shortDefinitions: knob or lever that is moved horizontally or vertically to control variable

definitions: a sliding door, especially one with a glass panel.
a small hamburger or other hot sandwich made with a soft bun.
shortDefinitions: small hamburger or other hot sandwich on bun

definitions: a North American freshwater turtle with a red or yellow patch on the side of the head.

notes.text: Genus Trachemys (or Pseudemys), family Emydidae: several species, in particular the red-eared slider or pond slider (T. scripta)

definitions: a pitch that moves laterally as it nears home plate.
shortDefinitions: pitch that moves laterally as it nears home plate
